name: Spear Remora
text:
2 Level 3 Fish monsters
You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card: all face-up monsters you control gain 300 ATK. (Quick Effect) During the Battle Phase: You can attach this card to a face-up "Shark" Xyz monster you control; negate the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent controls. Xyz monsters with this card as an Xyz material gain this effect:
- This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.
